SECTION.SUBTITLE: Do we disclose any information to outside parties
SECTION.SUBTEXT: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer to outside parties your personally identifiable information. This does not include trusted third parties who assist us in operating our website, conducting our business, or servicing you, so long as those parties agree to keep this information confidential. We may also release your information when we believe release is appropriate to comply with the law, enforce our site policies, or protect ours or others rights, property, or safety. However, non-personally identifiable visitor information may be provided to other parties for marketing, advertising, or other uses.

SECTION.SUBTITLE: Third party links
SECTION.SUBTEXT: Occasionally, at our discretion, we may include or offer third party products or services on our website. These third party sites have separate and independent privacy policies. We therefore have no responsibility or liability for the content and activities of these linked sites. Nonetheless, we seek to protect the integrity of our site and welcome any feedback about these sites.

SECTION.SUBTITLE: California Online Privacy Protection Act Compliance
SECTION.SUBTEXT: Because we value your privacy we have taken the necessary precautions to be in compliance with the California Online Privacy Protection Act. We therefore will not distribute your personal information to outside parties without your consent.

SECTION.SUBTITLE: Childrens Online Privacy Protection Act Compliance
SECTION.SUBTEXT: We are in compliance with the requirements of COPPA (Childrens Online Privacy Protection Act), we do not collect any information from anyone under 13 years of age. Our website, products and services are all directed to people who are at least 13 years old or older.

SECTION.SUBTITLE: Terms and Conditions
SECTION.SUBTEXT: Please also visit our Terms and Conditions section establishing the use, disclaimers, and limitations of liability governing the use of our website at http://www.myhomeremedies.com/terms.html

SECTION.SUBTITLE: Your Consent
SECTION.SUBTEXT: By using our site, you consent to our website's privacy policy.

SECTION.SUBTITLE: Changes to our Privacy Policy
SECTION.SUBTEXT:
If we decide to change our privacy policy, we will post those changes on this page.
This policy was last modified on 7/11/2012
